section.title: Introduction
section.p: Forrest is still quite young, so there are known issues. Standards compliance is a definite major goal. Please send patches for the Forrest skin stylesheets to ensure such compliance.

section.title: HTML
section.p: Tested using the W3C HTML Validation Service (validator.w3.org). The index.html page of Forrest sites will have a link to this validator, unless the user has turned this off.

section.title: WAI
section.p: There are actually many accessibility issues with the heavy use of tables and images. These skins are gradually being improved.

ol.li: Priority 2: Explicitly associate form controls and their labels with the LABEL element. Perhaps we could have a label hidden with CSS?
